Text.Page:
The orcans used to keep to themselves in their settlement along the river to the southwest.

That's changed. Someone's convinced them to fight us, raids and such. We need to know why.

Hunt down the orcans and gather any clues. Orcans are fond of trophies and symbols. That might help.

These bone trinkets belong to the unseelie. They're working with Thulsa and the mekonaris.

That explains a great deal. If the unseelie allied themselves with Thulsa, they'd eagerly recruit others to fight for them.

Clever little fiends.
Deal with the Bloodgulpers quickly, <PCNAME>. Fight well!
